original_title: The Positively True Adventures of the Alleged Texas Cheerleader-Murdering Mom
overview: A Texas housewife plots hire a hit man to kill the girl who beat out her daughter for a place on the cheerleading squad.
tagline: She wanted to give her daughter the best shot at being a cheerleader... The things you do for your kids.
title: The Positively True Adventures of the Alleged Texas Cheerleader-Murdering Mom
